notes: Textures refuse to load for character models. The "-force-d3d9" and other launch options do not work. Also the pause/inventory screen can loose focus of the mouse cursor. Which makes it impossible to go to options or properly close the game.
title: ReCore: Definitive Edition

notes: Many textures missing/invisible. Choppy and a great deal of tearing despite low settings.
title: ReCore: Definitive Edition

notes: Most parts of player and familiars missing/invisible. Choppy graphics even on low settings.
title: ReCore: Definitive Edition

notes:
Character models work after modification. You need to do the following

1) Go to ~/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Proton 3.7 Beta 
2) Find the file "user_settings.sample.py" copy it and rename the copy, "user_settings.py"
3) Remove the comment "#" from ""PROTON_USE_WINED3D11": "1","
title: ReCore: Definitive Edition
